name: .TAX2024 File Extension
summary: Learn about .TAX2024 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A TAX2024 file is a tax return file created by the 2024 version of Intuit TurboTax, a software application for preparing and filing U.S. Federal and State tax returns. It stores tax information for the 2024 tax year, including Federal IRS forms, State tax forms (if applicable), and user-provided personal and financial data. TAX2024 files are useful for archiving, transferring, or continuing tax return preparation.

content: The desktop version of TurboTax 2024 allows you to save your preparation progress as TAX2024 files (File → Save...). All four editions (Basic, Deluxe, Premier, and Home & Business) support TAX2024 files. When saving your file, you can also secure it with password protection.

TurboTax Online can also export tax returns as TAX2024 files. You might do this if you started preparing your taxes with the web version but want to complete them with the desktop version of TurboTax. You might also want to export them for archival purposes. You can download a TAX2024 file from the web version by clicking Tax Tools → Tools and selecting Save your 2024 return to your computer.

NOTE: If you modify your tax return in TurboTax Online after downloading the TAX2024 file, the software does not add those changes to the file since it does not sync them. To update the file with changes, you must export the TAX2024 tax return again.

instructions: You can open a TAX2024 file with the desktop version of Intuit TurboTax 2024 in Windows and macOS. To open a TAX2024 file, select File → Open Tax Return.

You can also open tax returns with TurboTax Online when importing tax data from the previous year. For example, you can upload a .TAX2023 file when filing taxes for the 2024 calendar year or a TAX2024 file when filing taxes for the 2025 calendar year.
To open a TAX2024 file with TurboTax Online while signed in to your account:
Click Transfer last year's TurboTax return from your computer.
Follow the prompts to upload the file.
You can only open encrypted TAX2024 files by entering the correct password.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
